source.author: Conn, B.J.
source.title: Zosteraceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons

leads.lead_text: Erect black branches present or absent; internode showing 4–12 cortical vascular bundles in cross-section; leaf sheath open; bracts enclosing anthers narrowly triangular
Branches never erect; internode showing 2 cortical vascular bundles; leaf sheath open or closed; bracts enclosing anthers broadly triangular
